author: sproul
content:
PSA: the Sigma Prime/Lighthouse validators will be attempting some 1-slot re-orgs on Ropsten as we test out this branch: https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/pull/2860

There are 2.5k validators proposing blocks 8 seconds late, and another 5k validators attempting to re-org those late blocks.

author: potuz
content: I wonder how this fits with your running of forkchoice 500ms earlier: if I understand correctly you run forkchoice again at second 0, just faster, to confirm your head. I can see how it's very unlikely that head will change between these two calls. However. I suspect that getting 10% of the committee (the default in this branch) is much more likely to trigger a change of head here
